data Module¶

class data.BasicEnergyStore(size=1)[source]¶

Class to contain recorded values of potential energy U, kenetic energy K, total energy Q and time T.

Parameters:size – (int) Required size of each container.
K_append(val)[source]¶

Append a value to kenetic energy.

Parameters:val – (float) value to append
Q_append(val)[source]¶

Append a value to total energy.

Parameters:val – (float) value to append
T_append(val)[source]¶

Append a value to time store.

Parameters:val – (float) value to append
U_append(val)[source]¶

Append a value to potential energy.

Parameters:val – (float) value to append
plot()[source]¶

Plot recorded energies against time.

class data.draw_particles(N, pos, extents)[source]¶

Class to plot N particles with given positions.

Parameters:
  • N – (int) Number of particles.
  • pos – (np.array(N,3)) particle positions.
  • extent – (np.array(3,1)) domain extents.
draw()[source]¶

Update current plot, use for real time plotting.
